abstract.p: Correction of Sept 6 article about Mideast peace talks; UN Resolution quoted

block.p: An article on Wednesday about the Middle East peace talks referred incorrectly to United Nations resolutions on the Arab-Israeli conflict. While Security Council Resolution 242, passed after the 1967 Middle East War, calls for Israel's armed forces to withdraw ''from territories occupied in the recent conflict,'' no resolution calls for Israeli withdrawal from all territory, including East Jerusalem, occupied in the war.

An article on Wednesday about the Middle East peace talks referred incorrectly to United Nations resolutions on the Arab-Israeli conflict. While Security Council Resolution 242, passed after the 1967 Middle East War, calls for Israel's armed forces to withdraw ''from territories occupied in the recent conflict,'' no resolution calls for Israeli withdrawal from all territory, including East Jerusalem, occupied in the war.
